dct_title_s: Scottish highlands and islands oil map / designed and produced for the Highlands and Islands Development Board by Carto-Graphics (Edinburgh) Ltd.
dct_description_sm: Covers the Scottish continental shelf, northern Scotland, and northern North Sea. Copyright "June 1981." Includes text, 2 statistical tables, 2 graphs, and abbreviation list.
dct_publisher_sm: Inverness, Scotland : Highland and Islands Development Board, 1981.
dct_subject_sm: Natural gas in submerged lands—North Sea—Maps
dcat_theme_sm: Natural gas in submerged lands—North Sea—Maps
